directions: Combine whole wheat flour and yeast in a large bowl.  Stir in sugar, baking soda, baking powder, and water.  Stir in anise seeds.   Let dough stand in warm area for 1 hour, letting bread rise.
Knead bread and put in 2 regular loaf pans.  Brush tops with beaten egg whites.
Bake at 400 degrees F (205 degrees C) for 50 minutes.  Enjoy!
title: Bread of Life
